entry.title: WRECKHOUSE WIND WARNING , Wreckhouse
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:56 PM NST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 2.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wreckhouse 11:30 PM NST Sunday 15 January 2023
Temperature: 2.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.2 kPa falling
Wind: N 25 km/h gust 43 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers this evening. Rain beginning near midnight except freezing rain inland and over higher terrain. Amount 5 mm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 this evening then becoming east 60 gusting to 80 except gusting to 100 in the Wreckhouse area overnight. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Showers. High 7.
entry.summary: Showers except freezing rain inland and over higher terrain early in the morning. Amount 5 mm. Wind east 60 km/h gusting to 90 except gusting to 120 in the Wreckhouse area. High 7. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Rain. Low plus 5.
entry.summary: Rain. Fog patches developing late in the evening. Amount 10 mm. Wind southeast 60 km/h gusting to 90 except gusting to 120 in the Wreckhouse area in the evening. Wind becoming southeast 40 gusting to 70 late in the evening. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 15 January 2023
